`r chunk_reveal("my_cars")`

```{r my_cars, include = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggstamp)
ggplot(cars) +
 aes(speed, dist) +
 geom_point() +
 stamp_point(color = "red", 
             x = 10, y = 100)
```
